Entries.NPC.cs.4001: I found that fruit gift-wrapped in my hobby room... Could MarILDA have stopped by?#$b#I gave it to you because I want you to know how much I love being with you.$l#$b#We have such different interests... On paper, I don't think most people would expect us to choose one another. But I think our differences enrich us both.$u#$b#You've changed a lot of the preconceptions I had about the farming lifestyle... And I got you to look up from the soil and out at the stars. We complement each other.$l#$b#What I'm saying is... I love you, @. You've made me a better scientist and a happier person.
